directions: Mix radicchio, arugula, and tomatoes in large bowl. Place lemon juice in small bowl. Gradually whisk in olive oil. Season dressing with salt and pepper. Add to salad; toss. Divide among 6 plates. Sprinkle salads with nuts. Serve with cheese.
ingredients: 1 12-ounce head radicchio, halved, cored, very thinly sliced
1/2 cup thinly sliced drained oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes
9 ounces smoked mozzarella, cut into 1/8- to 1/4-inch-thick slices
title: Arugula and Smoked Mozzarella Salad with Lemon Vinaigrette
